page.title: 04SOME LOCAL CHARACTERS
page.content: {Jim Forsey's }milk round starting 5am goes over Meldon Hill to outlying homes,since all farm milk is sold to the Milk Marketing Board. He delivers newspapers;in emergency he is electrician, plumber, even resuscitator - also volunteer fireman. {Sam Harris}worked on a Hittisleigh farm from age 8.Later a horsedealer.In Lettaford,1946;became dealer in scrap metal;collects from a 10 mile radius. His 2.5 acre yard mars an area of beauty.Scathing about the work-shy,and expert on rural customs. {Gay Hill.}District Nurse and midwife since 1974,loves the old people in her care "characters who once gone will nexver be replaced".She works 'all hours';combines social links with nursing.Isolated patients are reached on foot or by tractor when it snows. {A Common Link}long hours and hard work
